Developing Americaâ€™s Workforce Act
To require the Secretary of Labor to implement the industry-recognized apprenticeship program process, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Developing America's Workforce Act
This bill requires the Department of Labor to establish a process to identify industry-recognized apprenticeship programs for purposes of the National Apprenticeship Act.
